div.p: In this section, you will learn how to create a blank PowerPoint presentation.
div.section:
You must have
Microsoft PowerPoint 2007 or newer
Windows 7 or newer
Steps:

li.span: Open PowerPoint from the Desktop icon or the icon in the Start menu.
Select Create.
Select Blank Presentation.

section.p: You will create a new blank PowerPoint presentation.
If you have completed the steps, you will see this on the screen:

div.p: In this section, you will learn how to save a PowerPoint presentation.
div.section:
You must have
Windows 7 or newer
Microsoft PowerPoint 2007 or newer
A PowerPoint presentation
Steps:

li.span: Select File.
Select Save to save the current presentation, or Save As to save a new presentation on your device or in OneDrive.

section.p: You have saved a PowerPoint presentation on your device.

h1.span: Insert a new slide in a PowerPoint presentation

h2.span: Insert a new slide in a PowerPoint presentation

div.p: In this section, you will learn how to insert a new slide in PowerPoint presentation.
div.section:
You must have
Windows 7 or newer
Microsoft PowerPoint 2007 or newer
A PowerPoint presentation
Steps:

li.span: Select Home.
Select New Slide and select the desired Slide Layout.

section.p: You have inserted a new slide in the PowerPoint presentation.

h1.span: Insert a picture from your device in a PowerPoint presentation

h2.span: Insert a picture from your device in a PowerPoint presentation

div.p: In this section, you will learn how to insert a picture from your device in a PowerPoint presentation.
div.section:
You must have
Windows 7 or newer
Microsoft PowerPoint 2007 or newer
A PowerPoint presentation
A picture to be inserted to the presentation
Steps:

li.span: Select Insert
Select This device and navigate and select the desired picture.

section.p: You have inserted a picture from your device in the PowerPoint presentation.

h1.span: Insert a picture from Internet in a PowerPoint presentation

h2.span: Insert a picture from Internet in a PowerPoint presentation

div.p: In this section, you will learn how to insert a picture from Internet in a PowerPoint presentation.
div.section:
You must have
Windows 7 or newer
Microsoft PowerPoint 2007 or newer
A PowerPoint presentation
Internet connection
Steps:

li.span: Select Insert.
Select Online Pictures.
Type the image in the Search bar and press Enter.
Select the desired image.
Select Insertto insert the picture in the current slide.

section.p: You have inserted a picture from Internet in the PowerPoint presentation.

div.p: In this section, you will learn how to view a PowerPoint presentation.
div.section:
You must have
Windows 7 or newer
Microsoft PowerPoint 2007 or newer
A PowerPoint presentation
Steps:

li.span: Select Slideshow.
Select From beginning to view a PowerPoint presentation.

section.p: Your PowerPoint will be visualized on your screen.

div.domains: (map mapgroup-d) (topic abbrev-d) (topic delay-d) a(props deliveryTarget) (map ditavalref-d) (map glossref-d) (topic hazard-d) (topic hi-d) (topic indexing-d) (topic markup-d) (topic pr-d) (topic relmgmt-d) (topic sw-d) (topic ui-d) (topic ut-d) (topic markup-d xml-d)

div.p: In this section, you will learn how to play a sound through the entire slidshow.
div.section:
You must have
Windows 7 or newer
Microsoft PowerPoint 2007 or newer
A PowerPoint presentation
A sound in supported file format
Steps:

li.span: Select Insert.
Select Audio and then select Audio on My PC.
Select the audio file you want to add.
Select Insert.
Select the audio icon and then select the Audio Tools Playback tab.
Select Play Across Slides.

section.p: Your audio file will play through slides without interuption.

div.domains: (map mapgroup-d) (topic abbrev-d) (topic delay-d) a(props deliveryTarget) (map ditavalref-d) (map glossref-d) (topic hazard-d) (topic hi-d) (topic indexing-d) (topic markup-d) (topic pr-d) (topic relmgmt-d) (topic sw-d) (topic ui-d) (topic ut-d) (topic markup-d xml-d)

h2.span: Timing the slideshow for individual slides

div.p: In this section, you will learn how to set timing to each individual slide.
div.section:
You must have
Windows 7 or newer
Microsoft PowerPoint 2007 or newer
A PowerPoint presentation
Steps:

li.span: Select the desired slide.
Select Transitions and navigate to Timing.
Select After and type in the desired time.

section.p: After doing the steps for each individual slide, your slideshow will play automatically.

div.domains: (map mapgroup-d) (topic abbrev-d) (topic delay-d) a(props deliveryTarget) (map ditavalref-d) (map glossref-d) (topic hazard-d) (topic hi-d) (topic indexing-d) (topic markup-d) (topic pr-d) (topic relmgmt-d) (topic sw-d) (topic ui-d) (topic ut-d) (topic markup-d xml-d)

h2.span: Insert videos from YouTube and set automatic playback

div.p: In this section, you will learn how to add videos from YouTube and set an automatic playback.
div.section:
You must have
Windows 7 or newer
Microsoft PowerPoint 2007 or newer
A PowerPoint presentation
Internet connection
A web browser
Steps:

li.span: Open your browser and navigate on YouTube to the video, that you want to add.
Copy the video's URL from the Address bar.
Open PowerPoint and select the slide, on which you want to place the video.
Select Insert.
Navigate to Multimedia and select Video.
Select Online video.
In the Online Video dialog box paste the URL you copied in step 2.
Select Insert.
Select the video.
Navigate to Video tools and select Playback.
Next to Start, click the down arrow, and select Automatically.

section.p: You have inserted a video from YouTube, which plays automatically when you open the slide in Slideshow view.
